Sorry, missed that one. And sorry my last post came in three times. 
I'm trying to get a different web browser working on my comp.

::Element::

The two missiles hit Element's back, the gestalt ignoring the minor 
damage to his armor.

> OOC: Okay, also Shockwave did fire on Element before this.
